meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Room #1 C- South and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approve minutes from the May 7, 2024, Regular Civil Service Board Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Hearing Item(s)
agenda_items.description: Conduct the public hearing in conjunction with the proposed changes to the current Code of Rules and Regulations of the Civil Service Board.

agenda_items.title: Briefing and Discussion Item(s)
agenda_items.description: Civil Services Rules Revision Update and Department Updates and Announcements.

agenda_items.title: Action Item(s)
agenda_items.description: Adopt the amended Code of Rules and Regulations of the Civil Service Board and take any necessary or appropriate action as a result of Executive Session.

agenda_items.title: Performance Evaluation
agenda_items.description: Conduct the FY 23 annual performance evaluation of the Secretary to the Civil Service Board.
